title: Strictly's David James and Nadiya spark rumours after 'cosy' appearance on It Takes Two

David James and Nadiya Bychkova's "cosy" appearance on Strictly It Takes Two left some viewers' tongues wagging tonight.

The pair landed in the dance-off for a second week in a row after struggling to wow the judges with their American Smooth to Kiss From A Rose.

However they stepped up the romantic Batman-inspired number against Anneka and Kevin and were voted through to week four.

On Saturday, they will be performing a Quickstep to Greatest Showman hit 'From Now On' by Hugh Jackman.

Nadiya, who is engaged to Slovenian footballer Matija Skarabot, said: "He's really enjoying it and he's not using his notebook now."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: PA)

David said with a grin: "That's a secret!"

"You never said it was a secret," she retorted. "He's feeling the dance now."

Rylan pointed out that judge Motsi Mabuse had pointed out that he seemed softer now.

Asked whether he was connecting with the music better, he said: "Yeah, I think I am."

(Image: BBC)

However some fans also noticed Nadiya and David's connection, with one tweeting: "Nadiya's quite cosy with David there #ItTakesTwo."

While another questioned: "Are David and Nadia together?? #Strictly."

Meanwhile others gushed about how amazing Nadiya looked and how sweet David seemed.

One tweeted: "@NadiyaBychkova Smokin' HOTT on #ItTakesTwo."

Another wrote: "I simply could not love David James more. The SWEETEST! #ittakestwo."

*Strictly: It Takes Two returns tomorrow at 6.30pm on BBC Two
description: Ex England pro David and dancer Nadiya, who is engaged, appeared on the Strictly spin-off this evening
